description: Diabetes management follow-up with elevated blood sugar

expected_extractions.rationale: Missing hyper/hypo context - NER baseline may struggle
Blood sugar 425 implies hyperglycemia. No Type 1 indicators (no ketoacidosis, diagnosis 8 years ago suggests Type 2)

Blood glucose significantly elevated at 425 mg/dL

expected_extractions.rationale: Past medical history and assessment mention hypertension
key_phrases: Hypertension - well controlled on current medication regimen

notes: This note requires cross-section reasoning to connect blood sugar reading (425) with diabetes diagnosis to infer hyperglycemia. Baseline NER approach may only extract generic 'diabetes mellitus' without specificity.
